author: Jesse The Couch Movie Critic
comment: Just went back to Android Wear from Samsung, and I was like what new fresh watches can I find? It's been about a year the game should've advanced in that time. Lo and behold Tha Phlash is still killing em with the freshest, most realistic, and well designed faces. From the tiny details to function he's killing em all! Just coped that Super too from ur site that's what's up! Will definitely buy more. Have like 6 of his already. Lol.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jesse, yeah... better late than never but i wanted to say thanks for getting this one :)

title: Phlash you're Killing em!

author: Ken Hartmann
comment: This is hands down the best looking watch face available for the Moto 360.  Unbelievable style, fantastic customization options (the shortcuts on the metronome were an especially nice touch)... just a winner all around. How is this guy not at the top of the android wear suggested apps?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ken, this is great music to my ears.. Thanks so much, i really appreciate!!!

title: Hands Down.

author: Jacqueline MacDougall
comment: Love this. One question- twilight mode, does this change automatically? I have America and come night time the face colours change, so is this supposed to happen with Steampunk as it currently doesn't on my Huawei watch? Thanks

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jacqueline, i dont have auto switch at the moment but i keep it in mind for sure, thanks for the support as usual!

title: Great design

comment: I switched watch faces to test and voice control worked fine. And my color settings never stick. It randomly switches back to the default yellow. Huawei smartwatch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Annette, if you want you can email me ill try to help you out. Thanks for the feedback!

title: OK Google doesn't work

author: Eric Blumberg
comment: I Love I mean LOVE this face. It looks amazing on my Huawei watch. The overall look and the ability to customize the face are spectacular. I had a small issue with battery life, but Phlash hooked me up with a super simple fix. 5 stars just doesn't seem to be enough stars.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Eric... well, nothing like a good reinstall/clear cache to fix issues. If you wanna email me i will be glad walk you through it. Thanks for taking the time to leave a feedback..

title: Beauty but at a small cost

author: Nelson Rodriguez
comment: It was hard to pick a favorite from your incredible work until now. Love all of your watch faces but this one really got me. Keep it up and I'll keep getting them.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Nelson, i wanted to let you know how i appreciate you support sir, Thanks!

title: Another work of art.

author: R Wiley
comment: Wow! Dude this is so awesome, thanks for the retro. One request, could you make the twilight switch from day to night, automatically like your other watches.👍👍

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up R Wiley, thanks for the support and ill keep working at it :)

title: 10 STARS!!

author: Michael McKeever
comment: Love all your work, I have them all. Always waiting for the next new face. Please bring your Punisher face to Play Store. Thanks 👍

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Michael, sorry for the delay, but i still wanted to say thanks :)

title: Simply the Best

author: Adolfo Candray
comment: Hell yeah! After installing this watch face, no other one has replaced it on my Moto 360.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Adolfo... This is awesome! Thanks!

author: Adam Gordon
comment: Without a doubt one of my most favorite faces on my Moto 360 2. Thank you for your excellent work!

author: Chris Sanner
comment: nice looking face - trying to figure out why the heart rate never updates though...

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, the heart rate takes all the info of the "Fit" app and displays a "Average" of your heart rate. Say for example in the morning you used the fit app and got a 70 heartrate... then in the afternoon you do it again and get 100. The watch will display 85. Hope its clearer to you now. Thx!

author: France Nickel
comment: Will give a better rating once I can actually see it work on my Moto360

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up France, the watch face can be found in the Android wear app. Email me if you want ill be happy direct you to it. Thanks for the feedback!

title: Still not on watch

author: chrisdb1000
comment: Love it...could there be option to control how long active before going minimal please

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up chrisdb1000, there is one option for that in the settings. Its called Display time. You can email me if you want ill direct you to it. Thanks for the feedback.

author: Jared
comment: Never doubt. Always download. Trust AppMaster Phlash.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jared, true supporters. Never fail. My appreciation is high.

title: Always Tha Best

comment: How do i enable minimal?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Joe, its simply a matter of configuration, disable a few widgets and you're good to go. You can email me for more help. Thanks for the feedback.

title: Minimal?

comment: This guy right here makes the best looking watch faces around!  Purchased like 6 of them.  Keep it going man!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Piotr... Thanks for the awesome props, its always a pleasure to hear, good motivation all around :)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Heather... or should i call you "Awesome"? Because you are, thx for the support!

comment: Does this work with Samsung gear?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Sean, sadly Samsung does not run Android Wear but email me and ill see what i can do, thanks for the comment!

comment: Sir...you have done it again!!! another perfect watch face!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Albert, thanks for the support, veeeeery cool :)

author: John Miller
comment: Cant get this to go into night mode, it keeps defaulting to this basic white on black digital clock.  Screen time out seems to be 3 seconds and can not turn that off either.  Hauwei watch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up John, can you email me about it... ill help you out... thanks for the comment, its appreciated :)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up tearle... thank you for been there.

title: Awesome work

author: Mr. Malignance
comment: You need this. Everyone needs this.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Mr. Malignance... as usual you're always right! :)

title: Best watch face in existence.

author: Justin Wavra
comment: I installed it and the face was nice. However, I could not find anywhere to modify it. Nothing showed up on my phone (nexus 6) and when looking at the face on my watch  there wasn't a gear to modify it. This was basically a what you see is what you get. No extra colors or launching of apps and etc. Maybe it was a fluke I don't know. I can say that the only option when viewing in the play store was refund. Typically there is an open option. Sorry for the 1 star but it is what it is and that is non-functional

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Justin, the watch face can be found in the Android wear app. Email me if you want ill be happy direct you to it. Thanks for the feedback!

title: Can't change what you can't access!

author: Ron T
comment: I really was looking forward to these watch faces. Especially the ambient. After downloading onto my phone, it is nowhere to be found. I checked my gearwear app, apps and everywhere possible. It does show up in my app manager but I cant use it from there. Got my refund. Worthless.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ron, if you want to email me about it im sure we can get it smooth sailing. Sometimes things can go wrong. That's why im here. Your choice buddy. Thanks for the review and taking the time to communicate!

title: Sux

author: Andre Poydras
comment: Could you add the option for full watch face in dim mode.  Love the face but would like to see it all the time.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Andre, There is a option for that, its called Ambient mode... You need to set it to "Color" instead of "Monochrome" and you'll be golden. Thanks for the feedback, you can also email me about it if you want.

title: Very nice....but

author: Terrence Bustos
comment: Followed instructions in the description. Not luck after restarting everything.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Terrence, the watch face can be found in the Android wear app. Email me if you want ill be happy direct you to it. Thanks for the feedback!

title: No go
